title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Nonlinear Self-Regulation and Competition Preparation for Athletes

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of sports psychology, understanding of self-regulation theory, and basic awareness of competition preparation processes
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply three or more self-regulation strategies for different competition environments through VR simulations.
Learners can describe the process of designing individualized training periodization using a constraint-led approach with 80% accuracy.
Through team-based projects, learners develop real-game preparation scenarios and achieve feasibility scores of 4 or above on a 5-point scale via peer evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
